divs: Sighting Details (you can type over theseinstructions.)Please limit your narrative to 500 words (equivalent to 1 typedpage).My girlfriend went into our backyard to have a cigarette at approx. 113A20 pm. She observed a bright point of light to the north that was moving tothe south. She called me outside to observe it because we like to viewsatellites and stars and planets together.I came outside and immediately observed the object she pointed out as amoderately bright pinpoint that moved like a satellite (which we cannot normallysee from within the city due to light pollution).
